Description: Confirm goals scope success metrics and definition of done
AcceptanceCriteria: Goals documented and approved by owner

Description: Capture features constraints milestones and risks into a concise plan
Select architecture modules integrations and finalize stack decisions
AcceptanceCriteria: Architecture diagram and tech choices approved

Description: Create repo branches linters formatters pre-commit Makefile and CI skeleton
AcceptanceCriteria: Pre-commit passes and CI pipeline runs

Description: Provision Postgres on 5433 create schemas and run initial migrations
AcceptanceCriteria: psql conninfo ok and \dt shows tables

Description: Create FastAPI/Django skeleton with /api/health and logging
Initialize Vite React on 3000 and configure proxy/CORS to backend
Implement signup login logout and protected routes
AcceptanceCriteria: User can register verify and login successfully
Feature works via UI and API

Description: Add unit and API tests plus manual acceptance checklist
AcceptanceCriteria: Tests pass and manual checklist green

Description: Update DEVELOPMENT_CONTEXT README and troubleshooting guides
Deploy to staging run smoke tests and capture release notes
Address defects stabilize logs and performance and polish UI
AcceptanceCriteria: No ERROR/Traceback in logs during smoke

Description: Assess readiness and draft next backlog and sprint goals
AcceptanceCriteria: Go/No-Go decision recorded and backlog prioritized
